commands.title: n8n API: Get all workflows
commands.description: List all workflows in n8n instance - returns workflow metadata (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get workflow by ID
commands.description: Get specific workflow details by ID - includes nodes and connections (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Create new workflow
commands.description: Create new workflow via API - useful for programmatic workflow creation (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Update workflow
commands.description: Update workflow properties - can modify name, nodes, active status etc (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Delete workflow
commands.description: Delete workflow by ID - WARNING: this is permanent (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Activate workflow
commands.description: Activate workflow via API - enables triggers and webhooks (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Deactivate workflow
commands.description: Deactivate workflow via API - stops all triggers and webhooks (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Execute workflow (manual)
commands.description: Trigger manual workflow execution via API - available in n8n v1.95+ (github.com/n8n-io/n8n/pull/20234)

commands.title: n8n API: Get all executions
commands.description: List all workflow executions - returns execution history (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get executions by workflow ID
commands.description: Filter executions by workflow ID - useful for workflow-specific debugging (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get execution by ID (with data)
commands.description: Get execution details including all node data - full execution trace (community.n8n.io/t/tutorial-listing-running-workflow-exections-with-api/172501)

commands.title: n8n API: Get running executions
commands.description: List currently running executions - monitor active workflows (community.n8n.io/t/tutorial-listing-running-workflow-exections-with-api/172501)

commands.title: n8n API: Get failed executions
commands.description: List failed executions - quickly identify errors (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Delete execution
commands.description: Delete specific execution record - clean up execution history (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get all credentials
commands.description: List all credentials (without sensitive data) - credential inventory (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get credential by ID
commands.description: Get specific credential details (without sensitive data) - verify credential config (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get credential schema
commands.description: Get credential type schema - see required fields and options (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Create credential
commands.description: Create new credential programmatically - automate credential setup (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Update credential
commands.description: Update credential properties - modify credential configuration (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Delete credential
commands.description: Delete credential by ID - WARNING: workflows using it will fail (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get all users
commands.description: List all users in n8n instance - user management (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get user by ID
commands.description: Get specific user details - verify user configuration (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Test API authentication
commands.description: Test API key authentication with verbose output - verify API access (docs.n8n.io/api/authentication/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get API with pagination
commands.description: Get paginated results - useful for large datasets (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get workflows (pretty JSON)
commands.description: Get workflows with formatted JSON output using jq - easier to read (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Extract workflow names with jq
commands.body:
curl -X GET "{{n8n-url}}/api/v1/workflows" \
  -H "X-N8N-API-KEY: {{api-key}}" \
  -H "Accept: application/json" | jq '.data[] | {id: .id, name: .name, active: .active}'
commands.description: Extract specific workflow fields using jq - create custom reports (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Count active workflows
commands.body:
curl -s -X GET "{{n8n-url}}/api/v1/workflows" \
  -H "X-N8N-API-KEY: {{api-key}}" | jq '[.data[] | select(.active == true)] | length'
commands.description: Count number of active workflows using jq - quick statistics (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Export all workflows via API
commands.description: Export all workflows to file using API - alternative to CLI export (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Find workflows by name pattern
commands.description: Search workflows by name using jq pattern matching - find specific workflows (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)

commands.title: n8n API: Get execution error details
commands.description: Extract error details from failed execution using jq - debug workflow failures (docs.n8n.io/api/api-reference/)
